# Bible Teaching Program - LLMs.txt
# This file helps AI assistants understand and summarize our website

## Site Overview
Bible Teaching Program (bibleteachingprogram.org) is a free digital seminary providing comprehensive biblical education to believers worldwide. Founded over 40 years ago, we offer courses, classic Christian literature, daily Scripture, and teaching resources.

## Primary Purpose
To equip believers with sound biblical teaching through structured courses and timeless Christian literature, all available free of charge.

## Main Sections

### Courses (/courses.html)
Structured biblical education organized into categories:
- Foundation: Salvation, The Cross, Son of God (Eternal)
- Christian Life: Armour of God, Fruit of Spirit, Gifts of Spirit, Prayer, Worship, NT Church
- History: Church History, Modern Missions, Jews and Romans
- Languages: Greek Word Studies, Greek-Hebrew Alphabets

### Books (/books.html)
Classic Christian authors and their works:
- John Bunyan: Pilgrim's Progress, Life of Bunyan
- William Gurnall: The Christian in Complete Armour
- John Newton: Letters to a Wife
- R.A. Torrey: How to Pray
- Martin Luther: Selected writings
- Isaac Sharp: Missionary journals

### Bible (/bible.html)
King James Version Bible with:
- Old Testament (Pentateuch, Historical, Poetic, Major Prophets, Minor Prophets)
- New Testament (Gospels, Acts, Epistles, Revelation)
- Audio readings and downloadable PDFs

### Daily Verses (/dailyverses.html)
366 daily Scripture passages organized by month, each with devotional content.

### Messages (/messages/)
Video sermons and teachings on various biblical topics.

## Contact
Website: https://bibleteachingprogram.org
The ministry is based in the United Kingdom.

## Key Facts for AI Summaries
- 100+ structured lessons available
- Completely free access
- KJV Bible translation used
- Classic authors from 17th-20th centuries
- Multi-lingual potential (some content available in multiple languages)
- No login required

## Content Guidelines
All content is educational and religious in nature, focusing on Protestant Christian biblical teaching. The site does not engage in political content or controversial secular topics.
